subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Voters for the Baseball Hall of Fame in January emphatically rejected the candidacies of players from the steroids era like Barry Bonds, Roger Clemens and Sammy Sosa.
snippet: Voters for the Baseball Hall of Fame in January emphatically rejected the candidacies of players from the steroids era like Barry Bonds, Roger Clemens and Sammy Sosa.
